TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_lamit, title = lamit, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/lamit} }

S.FORM: lamit (kamu nu Hulam: 根部 ) u lamit nu kilang atu lutuk micepcep tu nanum i sasa nu lala'.
lamit (kamo no Holam: 根部 ) o lamit no kilang ato lotok micepcep to nanom i sasa no lala'.
